description: Update an existing cost index entry.
permissions: Allowed for admins or users who manage the cost index broker. Authorization is delegated to the parent cost index policy.
validation_notes: Provide the entry ID as an argument. At least one of --start-on, --end-on, or --value must be specified. Server validations: entries cannot be changed when was_used_in_adjustment_calculation is true; entries cannot be added or modified when the cost index is expired; end_on must be on or after start_on; end_on cannot be after the cost index expiration date when expired_at is set; date ranges for a given cost index cannot overlap.
